about_the_game:
Welcome to Calvard Case Files, an exquisite art collection that brings the vibrant world of The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II to life.

This official 32-page art book invites you into the Calvard Republic, a rising economic powerhouse of the Zemurian continent. Follow the intricate narrative surrounding Van Arkride, the underground problem solver known as a spriggan, who operates out of Edith, the Republic's capital.

Discover stunning illustrations and profiles of compelling characters: the composed underground fixer, the determined young student from a prestigious academy, the noble bracer known as Beauty's Blade, and the mysterious exchange student. The collection also features exclusive illustrations previously available only as store-specific bonuses in Japan.

A century after its democratic revolution, witness Calvard's new era through this essential companion to the game's rich universe.

content_descriptors.notes:
Rare occurrences of violence against bound hostages.
Discrimination against fictional minorities.
Usage of Fantasy Drugs.
Insinuation of child prostitution.
Depiction of Suicide
